MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the KY8 and KY7 postcode area of Leven and Glenrothes. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 3:18am. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of ongoing investigations and repairs and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 7am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5:17am on 16th January 2021.
